entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:37 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.0°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Fog. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches becoming fog this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog becoming fog patches in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
